item.description:
By popular demand!

Because there's a seven-week gap between our March and April Meetups, we've tentatively decided to schedule a mini-Meetup in the interim.

This Meetup will be an open studio, just for hands-on crafting and individual card-swapping--no formal scheduled activities.

This session is tentative, based on how many members respond--we need at least 10 confirmed to participate; 15 would be better (guests welcome). So if you're interested, please RSVP now (you can always change your mind later). It's almost certainly going to be at the Button Box in Wellesley again.

Note the later start time for this one: Noon rather than 10 a.m. There won't be anybody there to let you in before noon, so don't show up early!

The mini-Meetup will be low-key but with plenty of room for creativity and fun. Join us!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a blonde in a black or khaki apron and a name tag, or just yell, "Who's Anne?"

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: April Interim Meetup
